main: ^It is a 5-hectare shrine featuring a church was constructed in February 2002 and one of the most popular pilgrimage destinations in the province of Quezon. It is located in the slopes of Mt. Banahaw.

c-0: ^It features a 292-stairsteps with life size figures along depicting the 14 Stations of the Cross. On top of the hill is a 50-foot statue of Jesus Christ. The structure is said to be the third biggest in the world.
